result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Deonte Daniel Simmons

records.addlTxt:
Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 1:00 pm. 
INCLUDES: 22CF1168, 22CF1171 & 22CF1195.

Deft appears via video, in custody, pro se.  
Date and time set for review re: public defender representation prior to preliminary hearing. 
Court notes counsel has not yet been appointed. 
COURT finds good cause to extend time limits for preliminary hearing in 22CF1168 & 22CF1171.
Prelim is currently set for 10/19/2022 @ 9am, Branch 4 in case 22CF1195. Deft. wishes to proceed to prelim. Prelim will be held w/in time limits in 22CF1195. 

Adj: 1:13 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Deonte Daniel Simmons
Current: 1700 Jefferson Street, Wausau, WI 54403 United States  (Effective: 10-06-2022)
Prior: 6300 Birch Street #34, Weston, WI 54476
Calendar call on October 27, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

ADA Lacey Coonen appears in person; Deft appears via phone
DATES: 
CC 10/27 @ 1:00 

INCLUDES ALL OPEN FILES

INCLUDES 22CM921 and 22CM922: No contact with victim(s): Chatterbox Bar, 101 Pub, The Hampton Inn, Shell Gas Station (located at 3001 Schofield Avenue, Weston, WI) or C.J.F.  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.  Shall have his/her fingerprints and photograph taken at the Sheriff's Dept.  Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (4) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

2:44 p.m.
Clerk Micki. 
INCLUDES 22CM921 and 22CM922.

State appears by ADA Hannah Runde for ADA Lacey Coonen.  Defendant appears in custody from the MCJ via Zoom video, with Attorney Peter Vu.

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
PLEA:  NOT GUILTY on both files. 

COURT ORDERS: $1,000.00 signature bond to cover both files. 

CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with victim(s): Chatterbox Bar, 101 Pub, The Hampton Inn, Shell Gas Station located at 3001 Schofield Ave, Weston, WI, or C.J.F.
- Prints and photographs. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

Dates:
PTC - 9/29/22 at 10:00 a.m.

Branch 5.

ADJ: 2:48 p.m.
